Row.Text: Enemy Land Units must expend 1 extra [ICON_MOVES] Movement per Tile if they move into a Tile worked by this city. Reduces [ICON_CULTURE] Culture costs of acquiring new Tiles based upon the city's distance from the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.

The Krepost is the Russian unique building for Peter I, replacing the Arsenal. The Krepost increases the Defensive Strength of the city. In addition, the Krepost reduces the Culture cost of acquiring new Tiles, based upon its distance from the [ICON_STRENGTH] Capital. It also causes enemy units to expend 1 extra movement if they move through a tile worked by a city with a Krepost. It's quite worthwhile to construct these useful buildings in all Russian cities, but especially in cities on the civilization's frontiers; far from your capital. Unlike the Arsenal, the Krepost has no building prerequisite.

The Krepost is the Russian unique building for Peter I, replacing the Bastion. The Krepost increases the Defensive Strength of the city. In addition, the Krepost reduces the Culture cost of acquiring new Tiles, based upon its distance from the [ICON_STRENGTH] Capital. It also causes enemy units to expend 1 extra movement if they move through a tile worked by a city with a Krepost. It's quite worthwhile to construct these useful buildings in all Russian cities, but especially in cities on the civilization's frontiers; far from your capital. Unlike the Bastion, the Krepost has no building prerequisite.
Tsar
{1_CivName} Tsardom

The Krepost is the Russian unique building for Peter I, replacing the Bastion. The Krepost increases the Defensive Strength of the city. In addition, the Krepost reduces the [ICON_CULTURE] Culture cost of acquiring new Tiles, based upon its distance from the [ICON_STRENGTH] Capital. It's quite worthwhile to construct these useful buildings in all Russian cities, but especially in cities on the civilization's frontiers; far from your capital. Unlike the Bastion, the Krepost has no building prerequisite.
Our people are now shaving their beards and pickling their dwarves. I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.
Create the Table of Ranks

The Boyars of Russia have become both too powerful and too complacent. Re-determining the order of precedence to privilege merit and not birth should sift the unworthy from the ranks of the nobility.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Russia (Peter I) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Renaissance Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Culture} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+25% [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person generation

The Boyars of Russia have become both too powerful and too complacent. Re-determining the order of precedence to privilege merit and not birth should sift the unworthy from the ranks of the nobility.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+25% [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person generation
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has introduced the Table of Ranks to form the basis of their legal code, making it so that those of merit receive precedence over those of birth-right.
Institute the Preobrazhensky Regiment

Distinguished soldiers are simply the best. They cannot be counted among the ordinary rabble that make up our forces. Hence, we shall create for them the Preobrazhensky Regiment, a regiment only for the most prestigious of our soldiers.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Russia (Peter I) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Gunpowder [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Current Gun Units of level 4 or above gain +25% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength in Friendly Lands

Distinguished soldiers are simply the best. They cannot be counted among the ordinary rabble that make up our forces. Hence, we shall create for them the Preobrazhensky Regiment, a regiment only for the most prestigious of our soldiers.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Current Gun Units of level 4 or above gain +25% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength in Friendly Lands
Preobrazhensky Regiment
+25% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength in Friendly Lands.
A Russian scientist from the city of {1_City} has made the discovery of the law of conservation of mass! Whatever that is...
The Grand Embassy

Alas, our efforts to seek a secure alliance against the enemies of our realm have failed. Yet our diplomatic mission throughout the continent has not been for nothing. We are now equipped with a wealth of experience by which to make our government both powerful and modern.[NEWLINE]
We shall make use of our knowledge of Shipbuilding
We shall make use of our knowledge of Carpentry.
We shall make use of our knowledge of Dentistry.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a permanent 10% boost in the [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production of Naval Units[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a permanent 5% boost in the [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production of Buildings[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a permanent 5% boost in [ICON_FOOD] Growth rate in all Cities[ENDCOLOR]
We have implemented our newly acquired knowledge of Shipbuilding to the government of Russia.
We have implemented our newly acquired knowledge of Carpentry to the government of Russia.
We have implemented our newly acquired knowledge of Dentistry to the government of Russia.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has returned from a diplomatic mission around the world, bringing to the {2_CivName} new and modern practices of Shipbuilding.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has returned from a diplomatic mission around the world, bringing to the {2_CivName} new and modern practices of Carpentry.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has returned from a diplomatic mission around the world, bringing to the {2_CivName} new and modern practices of Dentistry.
The Bulavin Rebellion

The Don Cossacks of our realm, led by their Ataman, Kondraty Bulavin, have risen up in opposition to our efforts to modernize Russia. They pillage and rape the countryside, and march upon our cities and farmlands! We must put an end to this immediately, before they sow further discontent over our reforms.[NEWLINE]
We must crush this rebellion swiftly!
Let us concede to the demands of this Bulavin.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]2 enemy Cossacks appear[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold and {2_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
We shall respond with force against the uprising of the Don Cossacks!
We have conceded to the demands of the Don Cossack leader, Bulavin.
A Cossack Rebellion has broken out in {2_CivName} over {1_LeaderName}'s efforts to modernize the country.
In response to a Cossack Rebellion against his reforms, {1_LeaderName} has agreed to scale back his efforts to modernize {2_CivName}.
Eudoxia Lopukhina
